short_summary: Supply and deliver a quantity of 10 x Apple 16-inch MacBook Pros with Applecare+ and storage media retention or equivalent.
description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada has a requirement for the supply and delivery of 10 x Apple MacBook Pros with Applecare and storage media retention or equivalent, as per the List of Deliverables in the RFQ. This requirement is due to the need to improve the operations of the department’s researchers and P:"SC people. This will enable them to prepare accurate surveys and distribute them in a more efficient manner.

full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Apple MacBook Pro with Applecare+ and Storage Media Retention

#### Tender Details

| Details               | Description                                                                                     |
|------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Solicitation Number    | SSC-24-00027025:T                                                                        |
| Tender Closing Date     | 2024-08-01T14:00:00                                                                        |
| Description            | Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires 10 x Apple 16-inch MacBook Pro with M3 Max chip – Z1AG – (Space Black) with Applecare+ and storage media retention or equivalent.                                |
| Delivery Destination    | Ottawa, ON                                                                                |
| Delivery Date           | 30 federal government working days from contract award                                        |
| Security Requirements   | N/A                                                                                             |
| Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements | N/A                                                                                             |



#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Information

SSC is seeking proposals from suppliers for the requirement up. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

**Submission Requirements**

* Bids must be submitted via the P2P portal for RFQ Submission by the specified date, time, and place.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* For access to the solicitation and submission of the bid, please visit: <https://supplier-fournisseur-sspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login>

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries related to this solicitation, please contact:

* Name: Michael Boualavong
* Position: Procurement Officer
* Agency: Shared Services Canada
* Address: 99 Metcalfe Street, 11th Floor, Ottawa, ON K1A 1E3
* Phone: 613-402-8895
* Email: michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca

#### Addendum

Please refer to Addendum 000 for more information on the tender. Attachments related to the request for proposal, including the solicitation package and any additional required documents, are available at the following links:

https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/B2C031BF-8448-4580-83CF-7EB989BD10E1
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/DEDA8E90-9B8D
